text: 'in qarun kan min qawm musaa -elyh alsalat walslam- ftjawz hddah fi alkibr waltjbr elyhm, watayna qarun min knwz al'amwal shyyana ezymana, hataa 'inn mafatihah laythql hamalaha ealaa aleadad alkthyr min alaqwya', 'iidh qal lah qwmh: la tbtr frhana bima 'ant fih min almal, 'iina allah la yuhibu min khalaqah albatiryn aladhin la yashkurun lilah taealaa ma aetahm
